EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for downloading On the Radar: Spring Boot Simplifies End-to-End Development
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for downloading On the Radar: Spring Boot Simplifies End-to-End Development. We hope you find it informative and helpful. For specific information on Spring Boot, check out this page <[[http://projects.spring.io/spring-boot/]]> or start a project with Spring Boot here <[[https://start.spring.io/]]>.
Given your interest in this report, we thought you might also find these resources of interest: The Spring Blog <[[https://spring.io/blog]]> Webinar: Spring Boot Under the Hood <[[https://content.pivotal.io/spring/spring-boot-under-the-hood]]> Analyst Report: Spring Cloud Data Flow for Continuous Data Processing <[[https://content.pivotal.io/analyst-reports/spring-cloud-data-flow-for-continuous-data-processing]]> Blog: Messaging Patterns for Event-Driven Microservices <[[https://content.pivotal.io/cloud-native/messaging-patterns-for-event-driven-microservices]]> White Paper: Migrating an ESB to a Cloud-Native Platform <[[https://content.pivotal.io/white-papers/migrating-an-esb-to-a-cloud-native-platform]]> Video: Orchestrate All the Things! with Spring Cloud Data Flow <[[https://spring.io/blog/2017/02/13/springone-platform-2016-replay-orchestrate-all-the-things-with-spring-cloud-data-flow]]>
If you would like more information, or have any questions about how Pivotal can assist your organization on its digital transformation journey, don’t hesitate to reach out by contacting us here <[[https://pivotal.io/contact]]>.
Sincerely, The Pivotal Team
For more on everything from Spring to cloud-native to accelerating your application development and more, please join us at SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-confirmation-discount-2018]]>, taking place this September 24-27th in Washington, D.C. Use code S1P_Discount_100 <[[https://2018.event.springoneplatform.io/register?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-confirmation-discount-2018]]> and save $100 off the price of admission.
